title: The Expanse
plot: Two hundred years in the future, in a fully colonized solar system, police detective Josephus Miller (Thomas Jane), who was born in the asteroid belt, is given the assignment to find a missing young woman; Julie Mao (Florence Faivre). Meanwhile, James Holden (Steven Strait), the first officer of an ice freighter, is witness to an unprovoked attack upon the ship, by craft believed to be from Mars (MCRN Federation). As news of the attack spreads throughout the system, the incident's flow-on threatens to destabilize already tenuous relations between Earth, Mars and The Belt. Far away from the struggles in deep space, on Earth, Chrisjen Avasarala (Shohreh Aghdashloo), a powerful United Nations executive and diplomat, works to prevent war between Earth and Mars by any means. Soon, the 3 find out the missing woman and the ice freighter's fate are part of a vast covert conspiracy which threatens all humanity.
stars: Wes Chatham, Dominique Tipper, Steven Strait, Shohreh Aghdashloo

trailer.title: The Expanse
trailer.videoDescription: The future of The Belt has begun as Marco Inaros wages Armageddon against the Inners for a lifetime of oppression and injustice.

tagline: The stars are better off without us
keywords: asteroid belt,outer space,fictional war,false flag operation,ancient ruins

similars.title: Westworld
similars.plot: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite can be indulged without consequence.
similars.stars: Evan Rachel Wood, Jeffrey Wright, Ed Harris

similars.title: The Boys
similars.plot: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.
similars.stars: Karl Urban, Jack Quaid, Antony Starr

similars.title: Altered Carbon
similars.plot: Set in a future where consciousness is digitized and stored, a prisoner returns to life in a new body and must solve a mind-bending murder to win his freedom.
similars.stars: Chris Conner, Renée Elise Goldsberry, Dichen Lachman

similars.title: The Mandalorian
similars.plot: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.
similars.stars: Pedro Pascal, Gina Carano, Giancarlo Esposito

similars.title: Star Trek: Discovery
similars.plot: Ten years before Kirk, Spock, and the Enterprise, the USS Discovery discovers new worlds and lifeforms as one Starfleet officer learns to understand all things alien.
similars.stars: Sonequa Martin-Green, Doug Jones, Anthony Rapp

similars.title: The Witcher
similars.plot: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.
similars.stars: Anna Shaffer, Henry Cavill, Freya Allan

similars.title: The Expanse Aftershow
similars.plot: Writer/producer Ty Franck and actor Wes Chatham team up to bring you The Expanse Aftershow. Tune in weekly after each episode as Ty and That Guy dive into the development, behind-the-scenes, and easter eggs of Season 5 and onward.
similars.stars: Wes Chatham, Ty Franck, Shohreh Aghdashloo

similars.title: Star Trek: Picard
similars.plot: Follow-up series to Star Trek: The Next Generation (1987) and Star Trek: Nemesis (2002) that centers on Jean-Luc Picard (Sir Patrick Stewart) in the next chapter of his life.
similars.stars: Patrick Stewart, Alison Pill, Isa Briones

similars.title: Battlestar Galactica
similars.plot: When an old enemy, the Cylons, resurface and obliterate the 12 colonies, the crew of the aged Galactica protect a small civilian fleet - the last of humanity - as they journey toward the fabled 13th colony, Earth.
similars.stars: Edward James Olmos, Mary McDonnell, Jamie Bamber

similars.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
similars.plot: Set almost 100 years after Captain Kirk's five-year mission, a new generation of Starfleet officers set off in the U.S.S. Enterprise-D on their own mission to go where no one has gone before.
similars.stars: Patrick Stewart, Brent Spiner, Jonathan Frakes

similars.title: American Gods
similars.plot: A recently released ex-convict named Shadow meets a mysterious man who calls himself "Wednesday" and who knows more than he first seems to about Shadow's life and past.
similars.stars: Ricky Whittle, Emily Browning, Yetide Badaki

similars.title: Firefly
similars.plot: Five hundred years in the future, a renegade crew aboard a small spacecraft tries to survive as they travel the unknown parts of the galaxy and evade warring factions as well as authority agents out to get them.
similars.stars: Nathan Fillion, Gina Torres, Alan Tudyk

tvSeriesInfo.creators: Daniel Abraham, Mark Fergus, Ty Franck, Hawk Ostby
